body_html: Can we have official binaries in central with at least the different presets? And change the dependencies so that the JNI code is not implicitlly included in tensorflow much like how slf4j separates the API and does a lookup for the implementation.
body_text: Can we have official binaries in central with at least the different presets?  And change the dependencies so that the JNI code is not implicitlly included in tensorflow much like how slf4j separates the API and does a lookup for the implementation.
body: Can we have official binaries in central with at least the different presets?  And change the dependencies so that the JNI code is not implicitlly included in `tensorflow` much like how slf4j separates the API and does a lookup for the implementation.
